start_message:
Hello! I'll send you weather for a city or your saved home location.

Buttons below:
• ☁️ City Weather — enter a city name
• 🏠 Home Weather — weather for your home (set it once)
• ➕ Set Home — save a home location by city name
• 🗑 Remove Home — remove your home location

Commands: /weather, /sethome, /home, /unsethome, /subscribe, /unsubscribe, /privacy, /data, /delete_me, /help
multilingual_start:
Hello! Привет! Hallo! 🌍

I'm a weather bot that supports multiple languages.
Я погодный бот с поддержкой нескольких языков.
Ich bin ein Wetter-Bot mit Unterstützung für mehrere Sprachen.

🌐 Choose your language by tapping the Language button below to get started!
🌐 Выберите свой язык, нажав на кнопку Language ниже!
🌐 Wählen Sie Ihre Sprache, indem Sie unten auf die Schaltfläche Language tippen!
help_message:
How to use:

ℹ️ Quick guide:
• ☁️  City Weather — tap and enter a city name
• 🏠  Home Weather — show weather for your saved home (if set)
• ➕  Set Home — save your home by city name
• 🗑  Remove Home — delete your saved home

📌 Commands:
• /sethome <city> — set your home location
• /subscribe HH[:MM] — enable daily weather for your home
• /unsubscribe — disable subscription
• /privacy — privacy policy
• /data — what data is stored
• /delete_me — delete all your data
• /cancel — cancel input

🤖 Bot info:
• Version: {version}
• Released: {release_date}
• Created by: @frushanto
• Languages: {languages}
keyboard_help_message: To learn about the bot's functionality, tap the Help button on the keyboard 👇
sethome_failed: ❌ City not found or API error: {city}
subscribe_home_required: ❌ You must set a home location first before subscribing. Use /sethome <city>
subscribe_invalid_time: ❌ Invalid time format. Use HH:MM or HH (e.g., 08:30 or 08)
privacy_message:
Privacy Policy Summary:

• Bot stores your ID, selected city (home), and subscription time
• Data is not shared with third parties
• Data is used only for bot functionality
• You can delete your data with /delete_me
delete_me_success: ✅ All your data has been deleted
enter_home_city:
Enter city for home:

/cancel — cancel command
subscribe_enter_time:
Enter subscription time HH[:MM] (e.g., 06:00 or 6)

/cancel — cancel command
sethome_prompt:
Please write your city name or home address:

/cancel — cancel command
subscribe_prompt:
Please write the time for daily notifications (e.g., 08:00 or 8):

/cancel — cancel command
city_not_found: City not found. Please try again.
spam_warning: Please do not send requests too often. Please try again later.
spam_blocked_message: ⚠️ You are blocked. Time remaining: {seconds} sec.
language_selection_header:
🌐 Language

Выберите язык / Choose language / Sprache wählen
language_selection_instructions:
Чтобы выбрать русский язык отправьте: русский, ru или 🇷🇺
To choose english language send: english, en, 🇬🇧 or 🇺🇸
Um die deutsche Sprache zu wählen, senden Sie: deutsch, de oder 🇩🇪

/cancel — отменить / cancel / abbrechen
language_not_recognized:
❌ Language not recognized / Язык не распознан / Sprache nicht erkannt

🇬🇧 Try: en, english, 🇬🇧 or 🇺🇸
🇷🇺 Попробуйте: ru, русский или 🇷🇺
🇩🇪 Versuchen Sie: de, deutsch oder 🇩🇪
generic_error: An error occurred while processing your request. Please try again later.
generic_error_short: An error occurred. Please try again later.
no_admin_rights: You do not have permission to perform this command.
admin_user_not_found: User {user_id} not found or was not blocked
